name: Prosecutions not to exclude other remedies affecting license or goods
text: §281-106  Prosecutions not to exclude other remedies affecting license or goods.  The provisions in this chapter for the imposition upon any licensee of the penalties by fine or imprisonment for any violation of this chapter or of any rule or regulation made hereunder having the force of law shall be in addition to and independent of any other right of the liquor commission or the liquor control adjudication board under this chapter to effect a suspension or revocation of the license of the licensee and shall also be in addition to and independent of any proceeding to effect the forfeiture of any liquor or other property belonging to the licensee as contemplated by this chapter. [L Sp 1933, c 40, §65; RL 1935, §2633; RL 1945, §7285; RL 1955, §159-103; HRS §281-106; am L 1998, c 249, §18]
